attributes.action: Government to save this vital life saving charity. Crucial to our communities.
attributes.additional_details:
With the sad news that FASA is to close which will have a detrimental effect on our communities, now is the time we need the government to step in and help save this crucial charity. 
This petition has been started as it is a cause close to my heart, as I am only alive today because of FASA they stepped in and saved me when other services failed me.
attributes.background: FASA is a vital life saving charity run organisation at the heart of our communities. They help provide much needed support to those affected by suicide, mental health issues, addiction and substance misuse, not to mention the crisis centre which operates a 24/7.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. Health services are devolved in Northern Ireland.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
